author: UpIsNotJump
description:
Luna lets you play a huge range of great games straight from the cloud, and it works on almost anything! — Fire TV, PCs, Macs, iPhones, iPads, Android phones, and Chromebooks.

No installs, no downloads, just launch and play. Amazon Prime members already have access, so sign up for Prime with my link in the pinned comment! @AmazonLuna
title: #ad – Thank you to @AmazonLuna for sponsoring!
